My Code Tutorial¶

Setting up the environment¶

  1. Clone the github repo -

    git clone https://github.com/MSDS698/2020-product-analytics-group-project-factnews

  2. Navigate to the root directory of the clone repo.

  3. Create a new environment using terminal :

    python -m venv environment_name

  4. Activate the environment using

    source environment_name/bin/activate

  5. To install all dependencies/libraries run

    pip install -r requirements.txt

Running application¶

From the root directory on your terminal run:

$application.py

This will start the application in localhost using a Flask server.
